segments.text: That dog has white long hair . It ’ s lovely .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is my dog . I like her very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Her name is Fluffy . She is a sweet dog .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My dog has spots . He is very strong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don ’ t like big strong dogs .
segments.speaker: S2
